languages.text: "Я отвергаю установки предшественников. Я буду самостоятельно определять, что угодно Омниссии, а что является ересью против него".
"I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."
languages.original_text: "Я отвергаю установки предшественников. Я буду самостоятельно определять, что угодно Омниссии, а что является ересью против него".

traits.locale_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我拒绝接受在我之前的那些人规定的戒律。至于哪些做法会取悦欧姆尼塞亚，哪些做法是违逆祂的异端行为，我会亲自判断。”
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: “我拒绝接受在我之前的那些人规定的戒律。至于哪些做法会取悦欧姆尼塞亚，哪些做法是违逆祂的异端行为，我会亲自判断。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Rechazo los preceptos de mis predecesores. Acometeré yo mismo la tarea de descifrar qué agrada al Omnissiah y qué constituye herejía contra su voluntad».
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: «Rechazo los preceptos de mis predecesores. Acometeré yo mismo la tarea de descifrar qué agrada al Omnissiah y qué constituye herejía contra su voluntad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は先人の戒律を拒否する。何が万機神を喜ばせ、何が全万機神に対する異端となるのか、私は自ら判断する」
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: 「私は先人の戒律を拒否する。何が万機神を喜ばせ、何が全万機神に対する異端となるのか、私は自ら判断する」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich lehne die Gebote meiner Vorgänger ab. Ich werde selbst eruieren, was dem Omnissiah gefällt und was Ketzerei gegen ihn darstellt."
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: "Ich lehne die Gebote meiner Vorgänger ab. Ich werde selbst eruieren, was dem Omnissiah gefällt und was Ketzerei gegen ihn darstellt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je rejette les préceptes de mes prédécesseurs. C'est à moi qu'il incombe de déterminer ce qui satisfait l'Omnimessie et ce qui constitue une hérésie à Son encontre. »
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: « Je rejette les préceptes de mes prédécesseurs. C'est à moi qu'il incombe de déterminer ce qui satisfait l'Omnimessie et ce qui constitue une hérésie à Son encontre. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

languages.text: "Benden önce gelenlerin koyduğu kuralları reddetmekteyim. Neyin Hermesih'i hoşnut edip neyin O'na karşı kâfirlik olarak görüleceğine karar verme mesuliyetini bizzat üstleneceğim."
languages.original_text: "I reject the precepts of those that came before me. I will take it upon myself to determine what pleases the Omnissiah and what constitutes heresy against Him."

traits.locale_text: "Benden önce gelenlerin koyduğu kuralları reddetmekteyim. Hermesih'i neyin hoşnut edeceğine ve neyin O'na karşı kâfirlik olarak değerlendirilebileceğine karar verme sorumluluğunu kendim üstleneceğim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
